reviewText: The movie was very good...the actors matched each other very well.  Two things I would have wanted to see more, is a better historian synopsis, at some point there was no sub titled to English, Another point is that the Director should have took the time to make the ending more vivid as to what happened to all the  characters, To me, the ending was little bit sloppy...
The movie "Mu Lan" it was great and i'll like all episode.
